body_html:
Check failed: status == CUDNN_STATUS_SUCCESS (7 vs. 0)Failed to set cuDNN stream.

It's possible that there's an error earlier in execution, and this is just fallout. Once there's some error on a stream, any operation on the stream will fail.

Could you look through the logs carefully for warnings? And/or run with CUDA_LAUNCH_BLOCKING=1, which may make it easier to find "up-stream" errors.
body_text:
Check failed: status == CUDNN_STATUS_SUCCESS (7 vs. 0)Failed to set cuDNN stream.

It's possible that there's an error earlier in execution, and this is just fallout.  Once there's some error on a stream, any operation on the stream will fail.
Could you look through the logs carefully for warnings?  And/or run with CUDA_LAUNCH_BLOCKING=1, which may make it easier to find "up-stream" errors.
body:
> Check failed: status == CUDNN_STATUS_SUCCESS (7 vs. 0)Failed to set cuDNN stream.

It's possible that there's an error earlier in execution, and this is just fallout.  Once there's some error on a stream, any operation on the stream will fail.

Could you look through the logs carefully for warnings?  And/or run with CUDA_LAUNCH_BLOCKING=1, which may make it easier to find "up-stream" errors.
